productsList.name: Wireless Charging Pad
productsList.description: Charge your compatible devices quickly and conveniently with this wireless charging pad. Simply place your device on the pad to start charging.

productsList.name: Smart LED Light Bulb
productsList.description: Upgrade your home lighting with these smart LED light bulbs. Control brightness, color, and scheduling from your smartphone for customizable ambiance.

productsList.name: Fitness Tracker Watch
productsList.description: Stay on top of your health and fitness goals with this sleek fitness tracker watch. Monitor your activity, heart rate, and sleep patterns for a healthier lifestyle.

productsList.name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
productsList.description: Take your music anywhere with this portable Bluetooth speaker. With crisp sound and long battery life, it's perfect for outdoor adventures and indoor gatherings.

productsList.name: Smart Thermostat
productsList.description: Upgrade your home's heating and cooling system with this smart thermostat. Control temperature settings remotely and save energy with intelligent scheduling.

productsList.name: Digital Air Fryer
productsList.description: Enjoy healthier cooking with this digital air fryer. Fry, roast, bake, and grill your favorite foods with little to no oil for delicious results.

productsList.name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
productsList.description: Keep your floors clean effortlessly with this robot vacuum cleaner. Featuring intelligent navigation and powerful suction, it's perfect for busy households.

productsList.name: Wireless Earbuds
productsList.description: Cut the cord and enjoy wireless freedom with these earbuds. With noise cancellation and long battery life, they're perfect for music lovers on the go.

productsList.name: Electric Toothbrush
productsList.description: Upgrade your oral hygiene routine with this electric toothbrush. With multiple brushing modes and a built-in timer, it's perfect for a thorough clean.

productsList.name: Smart Doorbell Camera
productsList.description: Enhance your home security with this smart doorbell camera. Get real-time alerts and two-way audio communication for peace of mind wherever you are.

productsList.name: Digital Kitchen Scale
productsList.description: Make cooking and baking a breeze with this digital kitchen scale. Accurately measure ingredients for perfect results every time.

productsList.name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
productsList.description: Gain a competitive edge with this wireless gaming mouse. With customizable buttons and high-precision tracking, it's perfect for gamers of all skill levels.

productsList.name: Portable Power Bank
productsList.description: Stay powered up on the go with this portable power bank. With fast charging technology and multiple ports, it's perfect for charging your devices anywhere.

productsList.name: Indoor Security Camera
productsList.description: Keep an eye on your home with this indoor security camera. Featuring motion detection and night vision, it's perfect for monitoring your property day and night.
